SELECT wms_transfer.*, fwarehouse.warehouse_name as fromWarehouseName, twarehouse.warehouse_name as toWarehouseName, ouser.`name` as originatorName, tuser.`name` as operatorName
FROM wms_transfer
left join user ouser on ouser.id = wms_transfer.originator_id left join user tuser on tuser.id = wms_transfer.operator
left join wms_warehouse fwarehouse on fwarehouse.id = wms_transfer.from_warehouse_id left join wms_warehouse twarehouse on twarehouse.id = wms_transfer.to_warehouse_id
WHERE 1=1
AND wms_transfer.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND wms_transfer.transaction_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.transactionCode},'%')
AND wms_transfer.from_warehouse_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fromWarehouseId},'%')
AND wms_transfer.to_warehouse_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.toWarehouseId},'%')
AND wms_transfer.transaction_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.transactionTime},'%')
AND wms_transfer.storage_in_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.storageOutId},'%')
AND wms_transfer.storage_out_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.storageOutId},'%')
AND wms_transfer.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND wms_transfer.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND wms_transfer.operator LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.operator},'%')
AND wms_transfer.originator_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.originatorId},'%')
AND wms_transfer.field1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field1},'%')
AND wms_transfer.field2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field2},'%')

SELECT wms_storage_out_item.*,t_sku_product.sku_code as skuCode, t_sku_product.sku_name as skuName, t_sku_product.bar_code as skuBarcode, t_sku_product.field1 as skuUnit FROM wms_storage_out_item left join t_sku_product on t_sku_product.id = wms_storage_out_item.sku_id left join wms_storage_out on wms_storage_out.id = wms_storage_out_item.storage_out_id WHERE 1=1 and wms_storage_out.id = #{outId}
